title: idea for death recap
body:
When we die i complain about what who how and when. 
What about when we die it highlights what actually kills us.

Like for EG. i fight riven 1v1 and the minions and ignite help her i want to know what actually deals the final blow is it ignite is it the minions and ect

good idea i know :)

replies.body: anyone ever had revive do damage to them, even when no one in the game has it? {{summoner:10}}
even if they have it it does no dmg
sounds like you want a CoD Death recap thing
Yeah like a camera replay or something

lol wut

That would discourage people from communicating right after death. The death recap is there to help new players understand what sources of damage caused them to die so quickly (magic, physical or true) and then to provide tips on counter-playing champions (if you hover over them).
90% of the time its wrong tho lol

True.

I find it endearing, though. I mean, 173 true damage dealt to myself, THAT'S SUCH A CUTE MISTAKE 'CAUSE THAT'S NOT EVEN POSSIBLE OH YOU SO KAWAII~

I find it more frustrating when you die to a vayne thats 2/11 and has no farm, but you die to 80% true damage through your 432 armour.
